titleStmt.title: Lots wife A sermon preached at Paules Crosse.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Robert, Dr. in Divinity.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Iohn Flasket, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules churchyard at the signe of the black Beare,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A dialogue concerning iustification.
Identified as STC 25656a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules churchyard at the signe of the black Beare
